title: Beautiful Beings
description: An ethereal exclusive boarding school with unearthly beautiful students...Lux, a rebel girl, who has been seeing demons and angels since she was two...Asher, the bad boy on a motorcycle who sketches angels...Brax Kingsley who instantly captures Lux's eyes when she moves into the neighborhood...And the Hatchett twins whose parents were murdered, leaving them a ridiculous fortune...All brought together...all part of the puzzle behind the Beautiful Beings.The Beautiful Beings Beautiful Beings - Now AvailableHeaven and Hell (Beautiful Beings #2) - Now AvailableShadow Light (Beautiful Beings #3) - 2012
author: Kailin Gow
